phrases: Breaking news coming in right now
A mysterious death has occured in this city
It happened under the oriental bridge
The victim is a young female
The because of death in unknown
Those with information please contact the police
Participants can be rewarded up to S10,000
Boss, what do you need from us?
Look up where I can buy it
Boss sure has a good eye
Hey, I am still bathing, you should...
So you are all here at once
Humans must keep their distance from monsters
So you really were working with those monsters
That is why you always try to harm me
These monsters have already been tamed
There is nowhere to run now!
Big sis, do not be rash
So you are working with monsters
Today I will carry out the will of the heavens!
So this was your secret weapon
This generation of censorates sure are lively
Looking at them reminds me of when I was younger
Dahm spirit, this is getting ridiculous
I will have to use it
Fill the world with ice and darkness
Comply to my laws and decrees
It is those two brats again, cut it out!
You are messing with the headmasters youth
I will have them learn a lesson from this old geezer
You two, do you know what you have done?
It was clearly his own fault
Old people really should restrain themselves
I am not talking about you
Not only am I the headmaster, I am also the Minister of the Night Command
May the minister be in good health
Do not try to suck up now!
Do not you know to respect your elders?
We know that we are wrong
This generations of Elite Censorates, also known as the Night Command is the student council at Xiahou middle
Report to my office tomorrow and wait for your orders
That beastly women kept me up all night
This morning, a female body was discovered in the western district
There are no signs of injuries on the body
Police beleive that it is sudden death
There is definitely monsters behind this
You take quite an interest in corpses I see
Hey, do not sneak behind other people like that
I was just trying to tell you that you are going to be late for school
Getting in my way first thing in the morning, what do you want?
It has nothing to do with me
I am the one looking for you
This generations Night Command is Xiahou Middle School's student council
I am sure you already know that
Your recent actions have seriously affected the reputation of student council
Xiahou Middle has become a target of public criticism
You two, this is a task for yous
Anyways, you better behave yourselves in front of the new student council president when he returns
So our task was to repair the damaged buildings
I considered what the secretary said to us
I forgive you, it was nothing really
The goal of the Night Command is to kill monsters and promote peace
The hatred between me and you will only worsen if left that way
In the end, it may be difficult for us to ever reconcile again
In this world we only meet once
Let us go get along for the sake of the people
In the future, it may be difficult to say this again
With that said, I do not have to worry anymore
It was an accident, are you alright?
That is weird, my hand suddenly lost its strength
There is definitely something suspicious about that guy
An unidentified object has appeared in the sky
He floods the land with bliss
And fills the sky with music
Areas it passes by are affected by average or heavy rain
Now is live footage of the phenomenon
